translations.english: In autumn, eighth month, on the day jichou, Chancellor Shen passed away.
In the ninth month, Chang'an's city walls were completed.
He granted the people ranks, one rank per household.
He commanded the people to be allowed to sell ranks.

translations.chinese: 女子年十五以上至三十不嫁，五算。
translations.english: Women aged fifteen and above to thirty who did not marry were assessed five shares.
In summer, sixth month, Marquis Kuai of Wuyang passed away.
He built Chang'an's western market and repaired the Ao granary.

translations.chinese: 七年冬十月，發車騎、材官詣滎陽，太尉灌嬰將。
translations.english: In the seventh year, winter, tenth month, he dispatched chariots, cavalry, and foresters to Xingyang. Grand marshal Guan Ying led them.

translations.chinese: 春正月辛丑朔，日有蝕之。
translations.english: In spring, first month, on the day xinchou, new moon, the sun was eclipsed.

translations.chinese: 夏五月丁卯，日有蝕之，既。
translations.english: In summer, fifth month, on the day dingmao, the sun was eclipsed, completely.

translations.chinese: 秋八月戊寅，帝崩于未央宮。
translations.english: In autumn, eighth month, on the day wuyin, the emperor passed away in Weiyang Palace.
In the ninth month, on the day xinchou, he was buried at Anling.

translations.chinese: 贊曰：孝惠內修親親，外禮宰相，優寵齊悼、趙隱，恩敬篤矣。
translations.english: Appraisal: Emperor Hui internally cultivated closeness to relatives, externally showed courtesy to the chancellor. He favored and honored King Dao of Qi and King Yin of Zhao. His kindness and respect were sincere.

translations.chinese: 聞叔孫通之諫則懼然，納曹相國之對而心說，可謂寬仁之主。
translations.english: When he heard Shu Sun Tong's admonition he was fearful, when he accepted Chancellor Cao's response his heart was pleased. He can be called a lenient and benevolent ruler.

translations.chinese: 遭呂太后虧損至德，悲夫！
translations.english: He encountered Empress Lü who damaged his perfect virtue. How sad!
